author: Staff Reporter
text:
The results of the Diploma in Elementary Education examination that was held in May 2015 will be published on February 1.

Private candidates

According to a press release from the District Institute of Education and Training, Ranipet, mark sheets for private candidates, who had appeared for the examination in Vellore district, will be issued at the respective exam centres.

Private candidates can approach the exam centres and produce the hall tickets to obtain the mark sheets. The mark sheets will be given from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. from February 1 to 5.

Regular students, who had studied in private and government teacher training institutions, will get the mark sheets through the respective institutions. For further details, call mobile numbers – 98947 70688, 90251 66066, 9600316146 and 94889 34258 or visit website – www.eagereducation.blogspot.in, the release said.
title: Exam results to be published today
